a very large family of plants that includes the euphorbias, some of which cause problems in places where they do not grow naturally : Most of the hardy spurges make good garden plants. They are finding creative ways to control leafy spurge, a fast-growing weed.
More examplesFewer examplesWhen leafy spurge populations get out of hand, use of bio-control insects can provide effective control.The Macaranga tree is a member of the spurge family.All spurges have milky or yellow sap that is highly irritant.
